entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:48 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -26.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baie-Comeau Airport 1:32 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Haze

Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 45 %

Dewpoint: -35.1°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
